args.name: length
args.help: The length of the reference sequences.

args.name: queries
args.help: The number of queries to generate per reference.

args.name: references
args.help: The number of references to generate.

args.name: out_fasta
args.help: The file to store the references in.

args.name: out_sam
args.help: The file to store the queries in.

args.name: out_h5
args.help: The file to store the expected modifications in.

args.name: min_mapq
args.help: The minimum quality to consider a read.

args.name: min_phred
args.help: The minimum quality to consider a base.

args.name: min_length
args.help: The smallest query sequences to consider when counting modifications.

args.name: max_length
args.help: The longest query sequences to consider when counting modifications.

args.name: collapse
args.help: The minimum number of bases between modifications to consider them consecutive.

args.name: quality_window
args.help: The number of neighbouring bases to consider when calculating PHRED scores.

args.name: no_mismatch
args.help: Do not count mismatches as modifications.

args.name: no_insertion
args.help: Do not count insertions as modifications.

args.name: no_deletion
args.help: Do not count deletions as modifications.
